# chronosphere_gcp_metrics_integration (Resource)

Manages a Chronosphere Gcp Metrics Integration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "chronosphere_gcp_metrics_integration" "production" {
  name = "GCP Production Metrics"
  slug = "gcp-production"
  service_account {
    client_email = "chronosphere-metrics@my-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com"
  }
}
```

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `metric_groups` (Block List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--metric_groups))
- `service_account` (Block List, Max: 1) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--service_account))
- `slug` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

### Nested Schema for `metric_groups`

Required:

- `project_id` (String)

- `prefixes` (List of String)

### Nested Schema for `service_account`

Required:

- `client_email` (String)
